resourceType.description:
The FHIR Resource from which to map table columns 
https://www.hl7.org/fhir/resourcelist.html

tableMappings.description: A list of mapping rules to execute for a resource type

targetTable.description: The table in the database that this resource should map to

filter.description: A fhir path expression that resolves to a boolean for filtering out certain resources

columnMappings.description: A list of fhir path mappings to a column name

fhirPath.description:
The FHIR Path to use for the mapping 
http://hl7.org/fhirpath/N1/

columnName.description: The name of the column that this should map to

plugin.description: A module file to load and execute for advanced processing, results are appended to the mappings above
